mapper.update: update warranty_registration set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, country = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email_address = #{emailAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone_model = #{phoneModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, channel = #{channel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_model = #{productModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, register_time = #{registerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where register_id = #{registerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select register_id, name, country, email_address, phone_model, channel, product_model, order_id, register_time from warranty_registration where register_id = #{registerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select register_id, name, country, email_address, phone_model, channel, product_model, order_id, register_time from warranty_registration
